name: Nicotine Nightmare
overview: Nicotine Nightmare is a game in which the protagonist has the main task to stop a tobacco industry from producing cigarettes. The game starts with a screen very similar to Pssst in which the hero has to extinguish some cigarettes with a watering can paying attention to a devil who from time to time re-ignites them. The following stages look like a more straightforward platformer in which the goal is to halt the cigarette production by simply turning off the machinery.
